channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on Refresh Annapolis Valley
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: National Learn to Code Day: Intro to AI and Machine Learning
item.description: Join hundreds of Canadians coast to coast to coast taking their first steps learning about Computer Science. National Learn to Code Day was launched by Ladies Learning Code 5 years ago! At this “Women Learning Code” event, we will learn about Artificial intelligence and machine learning. From Siri on your iPhone to Google Map suggestions, to recommendations for purchases during your Amazon check-out, AI is all around us. AI and machine learning at its core is about data - and ways to make meaning of data.

item.title: Matthew Doucette
item.description: I am a video game developer (Xbox 360 & PC). Check out my video game company, Xona Games, and my first professional video game, Duality ZF, for more information. My only parter is my twin brother, Jason Doucette. Here is the Duality ZF April 2009 trailer:
